alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northwestern Walton, Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Laurel Hill to 6 miles west of Graceville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, De Funiak Springs, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Glendale, Izagora, New Harmony and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
